Class Humanoid

java.lang.Object
model.Humanoid
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class Humanoid
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Humanoid()
    This constructor creates a Humanoid with a default name

    This constructor creates a Humanoid with a name
    Humanoid​(java.lang.String name, double hp, double hpMax, double attackStat, double defenseStat)
    This constructor creates a Humanoid from a name, a number of HP, a number of HP max, a number of damages and a defense stat

      public Humanoid​(java.lang.String name, double hp, double hpMax, double attackStat, double defenseStat)

      hp - HP
      hpMax - HP maximum
      attackStat - Damages for each attack
      defenseStat - Percentage of damages blocked
